Name_en: Ho Man Tin East Service Reservoir Playground
Name_cn: 東何文田配水庫遊樂場
Address_en: Fat Kwong Street, Kowloon.
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• Toilets and changing rooms with lockers are provided in the Playground.
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 遊樂場設有洗手間、更衣室及貯物櫃
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
Opening_hours_cn: 每日上午8時至下午6時

Address_en: 13 Inverness Road, Kowloon City, Kowloon.
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• Men’s and ladies’ changing rooms and toilets
  • Kiosk
  • Fee-charging car park (including 1 designated disabled parking space)
  • Other facilities include 2 artificial turf soccer pitches, 2 elderly fitness corners, a bauhinia garden, a jogging track of length 550m, a roller skating rink, a pebble path, 2 hard-surface 7-a-side soccer pitches, 2 hard-surface basketball courts, a children's playground and a dog garden.
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 公園內設有男、女更衣室及洗手間(設有暢通易達洗手間)
  • 小食亭
  • 收費停車場(設有1個殘疾人士專用車位)
  • 其他設施包括2個人造草地足球場、2個長者健體園地、1個洋紫荊園、1條550米長的緩跑徑、1個滾軸溜冰場、1條卵石徑、2個硬地7人足球場、2個硬地籃球場、1個兒童遊樂場和1個狗公園。
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
Opening_hours_cn: 每日上午8時至下午6時

Address_en: 8 Fu Hong Street, Siu Sai Wan, Hong Kong
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• Covered spectator stand with 12,000 seating
  • Fee Paying Car park with 70 parking capacities (5 nos. for coaches, 10 nos. for motor cycles, 54 nos. for private cars and 1 designated disabled parking space)
  • Fast food and light refreshment kiosks
  • Changing room and toilet for male, female, conference room.
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Accessible Changing Room, Accessible Lift (with Assistive Listening System), Tactile Guide Path, Visual Fire Alarm System, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 1個有蓋可容納12 000名觀眾的看台
  • 1個可容納70輛車停泊的收費停車場(5大型貨車,10電單車,54個私家汽車車位及1個殘疾人士專用車位)

  • 男及女更衣室、洗手間、會議室、等等
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、暢通易達更衣室、暢通易達升降機 (設有廣播裝置)、觸覺引路帶、視像火警警報、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
Opening_hours_en: 8am to 10pm (except 1<sup>st</sup> –3<sup>rd</sup> day of Lunar New Year) (Annual Turf Maintenance period is mid-July to August and mid-December to end of December)
Opening_hours_cn: 上午8時至晚上10時 (農曆年初一至年初三除外) (每年7月中至8月及12月中至12月下旬暫停開放，進行草地保養。)
Remarks_en: Maintenance day is 8 am to 5 pm every Monday
Remarks_cn: 定期保養日為每星期一上午8時至下午5時

Remarks_en: Maintenance day is on every Wednesdays (Whole day) and on every Fridays (From 1pm).

Address_en: No. 21 Shing Mun Road, Tsuen Wan
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• A all weather 8 lanes of 400M running track comply with international standard
  • Floodlight system
  • 2 Covered spectator stands (about 5 000 seats)
  • Men's and ladies' changing rooms and toilets
  • Drinking fountain
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
  • Public Address System
  • Fee-paying car park with 46 car park spaces (including one accessible parking space)
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 1條符合國際標準的全天候8線400米跑道
  • 設有泛光照明系統
  • 2座有蓋觀眾看台( 約5 000個座位)
  • 飲水器
  • 廣播系統
  • 男、女更衣室及洗手間
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
  • 1個可容納46個車位的收費停車場 (設有1個暢通易達停車位)
Opening_hours_en:
All days (except 1st –3rd day of Lunar New Year) from 8 am to 10:30 pm daily and 1.5 hours for each session.
(Except 12:30 pm to 1:30 pm)
Opening_hours_cn:
全年開放 (農曆年初一至年初三除外), 可供租用時間由每日上午8時至晚上10時30分，以一個半小時為一節計算。
(下午12時30分至1時30分除外)
Remarks_en:
Maintenance Day

Weekly maintenance day: every Monday
Summer turf maintenance period: Late June to late August
Winter turf maintenance period: mid December to late December

 

How to Access

MTR

  • Tai Wo Hau Station - Exit B
    (Kwok Shui Road Park > Kwok Shui Road > Shing Mun Valley Swimming Pool > Shing Mun Valley Park > Shing Mun Valley Sports Ground)



Bus
Get off at Shek Wai Kok Station

  • KMB Bus No. 32 (Shek Wai Kok to Olympus Railway Station)
  • KMB Bus No. 32B (Cheung Shan Estate to Tsuen Wan West Railway Station)
  • KMB Bus No. 32M (Cheung Shan Estate to Kwai Fong Railway Station)
  • KMB Bus No. 43X (Shatin Yiu On Estate to Tsuen Wan West Railway Station)



Minibus
Get off at Shek Wai Kok Station

  • Public Light Bus (Red Minibus) (Hoi Pa Street to Cheung Shan Estate)
  • Green Minibus No. 81 (Siu Wo Street to Lo Wai)
  • Green Minibus No. 81M (Siu Wo Street to Shek Wai Kok Estate)
  • Green Minibus No. 82M (Siu Wo Street to Cheung Shan Estate)
  • Green Minibus No. 94 (Shek Wai Kok Estate to Kwai Shing )
  • Green Minibus No. 312 (Tsing Yi Railway Station to Lei Muk Shu Estate)



Vehicular Route

  • Way From Sha Tin:
    - Exit from Shing Mun Tunnel > Wo Yi Hop Interchange > Cheung Shan Estate Road West > Entrance of Cheung Shan Gate
  • Way from Tsuen Wan:
    - Texaco Road North > Shek Wai Kwok Road > Yi Pei Chun Road > Sam Tung Uk Road > Wo Yi Hop Interchange > Cheung Shan Estate Road West > Entrance of Cheung Shan Gate
Remarks_cn:
定期保養日

每周草地保養：逢星期一
夏季草地保養期：6月下旬至8月下旬期間
冬季草地保養期：12月中旬至12月下旬期間

 

前往途徑

港鐵

  • 大窩口站 - B 出口
    （國瑞路公園 > 國瑞路 > 城門谷游泳池 > 城門谷公園 > 城門谷運動場）



巴士
石圍角邨車站下車

  • 九巴32號 (石圍角邨至奧運鐵路站)
  • 九巴32B號 (象山邨至荃灣西鐵站)
  • 九巴32M號 (象山邨至葵芳鐵路站)
  • 九巴43X號 (沙田耀安邨至荃灣西鐵站)



小巴
石圍角邨車站下車

  • 公共小型巴士(紅巴) (海壩街至象山邨)
  • 專線小巴81（兆和街至老圍）
  • 專線小巴81M (兆和街至石圍角邨)
  • 專線小巴82M (兆和街至象山邨)
  • 專線小巴94 (石圍角邨至葵盛)
  • 專線小巴312 (青衣機鐵站至梨木樹邨)



車輛行駛路線

  • 由沙田前往：
    - 城門隧道出口 > 和宜合交匯處 > 象山邨西路 > 象山閘入口
  • 由荃灣前往：
    - 德士古道北 > 石圍角路 > 二坡圳路 > 三棟屋路 > 和宜合交匯處 > 象山邨西路 > 象山閘入口

Ancillary_facilities_en:
• Toilets and changing rooms with lockers are provided (including accessible toilet).

Opening_hours_en: 8 am to 10:30 pm ( 1.5 hours per session)
Opening_hours_cn: 上午8時至晚上10時30分 (以1小時30分為1節計算)
Remarks_en: The grass pitch of Sai Tso Wan Recreation Ground is the designated training venue for the Hong Kong Baseball National Squads.  Each month, 45 sessions are allocated for the training of athletes by the Hong Kong Baseball Association, and about 20-25 sessions are available for booking by organisations and the general public for baseball/football activities.
Remarks_cn: 晒草灣遊樂場的草地球場為香港棒球代表隊的指定訓練場地，每月編配45節訓練時段予香港棒球總會作培訓運動員用途。其餘可供團體及市民租用作棒球／足球活動的節數約為20-25節。

Address_en: 13 Inverness Road, Kowloon City
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• A 8-lane 400 m all-weather running track which is up to international standard is provided.
  • A spectator stand with 1,216 seats is provided.
  • A standard 11-a-side natural turf soccer pitch is provided.
  • A male toilet and a female toilet are provided. (including accessible toilet)
  • A male changing room with toilet and a female changing room with toilet.
